roleset.name: assign label
roleset.note: BRAND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brand' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from brand.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: funky word order
example.text: In a new TV ad, for instance, a woman going through the Sunday newspaper brands as hype claims by other stores that they are offering goods for ``50%, 60% and 70% off.
example.arg: a woman going through the Sunday newspaper
claims by other stores that they are offering goods for ``50%, 60% and 70% off
